error.signature: RuntimeError: CUDA error: an illegal memory access was encountered
error.regex: CUDA error: an illegal memory access

verdict.summary: GPU kernel accessed invalid memory — buffer overrun, freed memory, or wrong tensor shape.

dead_ends.action: Catching the error and continuing training
dead_ends.why_fails: GPU is in error state; all subsequent CUDA operations will fail
Illegal access is about address validity, not memory quantity

workarounds.action: Set CUDA_LAUNCH_BLOCKING=1 to get accurate error location
workarounds.how: Synchronous execution pinpoints which kernel caused the error

workarounds.action: Check tensor shapes and indices — off-by-one errors are the most common cause
workarounds.how: Verify all indexing operations stay within tensor dimensions
